website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you're looking for novelty lighting and don't mind buying multiple strands.
pros: Whimsical dragonfly design in multiple colors
Solar- powered charge provides up to eight hours of light
cons: On the short side at just over 15 feet per strand
Pricey if you need more than one strand

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase and I will be buying more. Love,love, love the lights. Here in Florida the weather is hot and very humid. We have a lot of rain in the summer time. These lights hold up very well in this climate. When I get up at 6 a.m., I look out my kitchen window and my dragonfly lights are STILL ON. That's 8 hours or more!!! I have purchased them as gifts for relatives, in other parts of the country and got such rave reviews, I had to buy a set for myself. Wonderful product that I can be used all year around.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Made a great mother's day present
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mom and she loves them. The spark lots of joy for her and my dad and have kept working for 8+ months. The only thing is that they are more primary and bold secondary colors (red, yellow, blue, green, purple) not the colors pictured in the picture... my folks are happy.
customer_reviews.author: thegreenbeagle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lights charged quickly and lasted all night long! Think I'll be ordering a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice working lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great. They have alot of color and I can see them from a distance. The only thing I have to laugh at are the instructions (not that you need them). I think they were translated from a different language because parts of it don't make sense. I would have liked to have known the different modes but it was just something I had to play with and find out for myself. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the charge and stay lit all night
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have been using them on my balcony and love them. I don't get much sunlight and was worried that I wouldn't have enough sunlight to fully charge. I only get direct sunlight from 7am to 11am. At dusk, the lights automatically go on and stay on all night and shut off once the sun rises again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Punch of color
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Great decor for my small yard. I didn't want to put anything in the ground since my yard is so small, but I wanted to bring in some color. I got these lights and hung on back fence, securing solar panel to top of fence for sun. They work great for a lunch of color.
customer_reviews.author: lmares31

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: LITES BIGGER THAN THOUGHT WHICH I LIKE......THEY WILL SHOW MORE ON DECK RAIL........ THIS IS MOTHER"S DAY GIFT FOR MY DAUGHTER..........SO WILL SEE SOLAR PROCESS WHEN SHE SETS IT UP ON DECK.... THE DRAGONFLY"S OUR CLEAR IN COLORE SO THE LITES MUST BE COLORED.........THINK THIS MAKES A DIFFERENT TYPE GIFT....
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH IN NC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 strings and put them around a patio cover. Put all 3 strings up a week ago. One string is already going out. Only half of it works now. Wouldn't buy them again. Don't expect the other 2 to last considering all this. Sad because the lights really are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: T. Poston

customer_reviews.title: Magic in the garden
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, I was surprised on the nice life size of the dragonfly light covers. Charged fairly fast was bright and magical, liked effect in the garden! I will buy more strings for the garden , last several hours into the night. Very happy will purchase . Price was fair for the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Very Colorful!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best strings lights - they are very colorful, they charge easily and stay light for more hours than any other previous string lights.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lenger

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The concept of these is okay and they worked okay however you can't see that they are dragonflies at night and they just look like blinking christmas lights so I put them away and will take them out at Christmas. It just looked kind of silly in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA CLAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lighting decour for my outdoor arbor. It shines very bright at night. Quality set of lights. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: There's solar and they're working great
customer_reviews.text: My yard is all lit up for taking my little girl out I just for safety reasons anyway I put them on a tree and they look very pretty very nice wood order again

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful and even when it's not very funny they still light up beautifully

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much I ordered another string of dragonfly ...
customer_reviews.text: It is remarkable how long the dragonfly lights stay on. There doesn't even need to be lots of sunshine for it to work. It stays on all night until the morning. I liked it so much I ordered another string of dragonfly lights.
customer_reviews.author: tom stuck

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Lights!
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for these lights! I ordered 3 sets. The lights arrived quickly and are very pretty. I have them strung around my chicken coop ;-) and in some trees. The lights are bright and have been lasting all night when charged on a sunny day. I highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Like Fairy Lights
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE. I have a tiny little balcony and just wanted something to enjoy while I'm out there. I half-expect to see Tinkerbell stop by.

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS, I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: The picture here does not do these lights justice. I'm not sure that any picture would. As you can see from the picture, they are multi-colored which gives them a magical quality. These lights are gorgeous! I absolutely love them. Being solar powered, they are easy to install and operate as long as sunlight is available for them to get sufficient energy to operate. I'm not certain how long they stay powered up; because I have never stayed up long enough to find out. I'm so glad I found these. Please hit the “Yes” button if you found this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cain

product_meta.title: Joomer Dragon 20 LED Solar String Fairy Lights, 1PACK Multi-Color
product_meta.description: ?? Durable & innovative products with strong r&d team ?? 5 million+ satisfied users ?? solar powered, No utility energy costs ?? special dragonfly appearance makes your environment look out of the ordinary ?? lights turn on automatically at dusk ?? up to 8 hours of continuous lighting with One single charged Specifications ?? light color: Multicolor (red/yellow/green/purple) ?? LED quantity: 20 LED ?? rechargeable Ni-MH battery: 1. 2V 600Ma ?? switch: power on/off, mode ?? lighting mode: steady & 7 blinking modes ?? solar panel: 2V 100Ma ?? charging time: 6 hours ?? light length: 16' (4. 8M) ?? length between 2 blubs: 0. 5' (0. 165M) ?? length from solar panel to first stake: 5' (1. 5M) ?? solar panel with ground stake(8in/20cm) for easy positioning what's in the box ?? dragonfly solar string lights ?? solar panel with ground Stake ?? user manual
feature_bullets: Suitable for all decorations - These outdoor string lights illuminate during night, add charming atmosphere to your garden, patio, lawn, porch, gate, yard, etc
Solar powered string lights - Solar panel (2V/100MA) with 1. 2V 600mAh rechargeable Ni-MH battery, charge under sunshine and turn on at dusk automatically, low voltage power, non plug-in
Long working time - up to 8 hours of continuous lighting with a single battery fully charged
Easy to install & Operate - ground stake included for you to set up the Solar panel, 2 switch buttons, power on/off, mode (steady/flashing)

Waterproof Solar lights - 15. 7Ft (4. 9Ft lead wire included) 20 LED dragonfly Solar Christmas lights can withstand all kinds of weather, including heavy rain and snow, perfect for indoor and outdoor decorations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
